messages.title: A LOCAL MAN
messages.content: Jim lives in the constituency and brought his family up here. He knows the area, its needs and its people so he can effectively represent them in Parliament.

messages.title: A RECORD OF SERVICE
messages.content: Jim's record of work for all his constituents is powerful evidence of his commitment to the needs of our constituency. He does his best to help whatever the problem.

messages.title: A BELIEF IN PEOPLE
messages.content: Jim believes that people want to live their lives without Government interference whilst working together to help the most vulnerable. Encouraging people to take responsibility for themselves and their families will mean public services respond to their needs.

contactInformation.address: Snailbridge House, The Moor, Fordham, Cambridgeshire, CB7 5LU
